version_description: Various improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Thanks for playing the game! Some fixes with this update.

- The first of many upcoming events is the “Winter Party”
- Hilarious new items and deadly weapons at your disposal.
- The ability to collect event tokens and unlock all special items
- Character upgrade - increased sarcasm, better trolling skills and most importantly, extra despicability!
A new weapon with this update plus some fixes and corrections. Thanks for playing the game!
Various bugs fixes and improvements. Let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas! New weapons are on the way, stay tuned! ;)

Various bugs fixes and improvements.

Improve the game with us: let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas!
Happy Easter to everyone! Download this update and enjoy the game! Thanks a lot for your reviews and feedback. New weapon is coming soon!
Some fixes and improvements. New weapon is coming, get ready!
New awesome elements & weapons arrived: Xpogo, Paintball Gun, Cactus, Keyboard and legendary Black Bomb. What are you waiting for? Go and try them! Boom shakalaka!…

Superhero stuff have arrived - Hell Gun, Whistle Arrow, Golden Trident, Telekinesis, Eaglerangs and many more! Go and try them! Also, new daily gifts to make you feel better ) Download the update and enjoy!
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Optimized for iOS 11

We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
